name: todoist_scrape_productivity
description: Scrape Todoist productivity/karma stats. Requires login.

steps.code: const stats = {}; document.querySelectorAll('[class*="stat"], [class*="Stat"], .karma-summary span, dt, dd').forEach(el => { const text = el.textContent.trim(); if(text.length<50) { const parts = text.split(':'); if(parts.length===2) stats[parts[0].trim().toLowerCase()]=parts[1].trim(); } }); const allText = document.body.innerText; const karma = allText.match(/karma[:\s]+(\d[\d,]*)/i)?.[1]||''; const completed = allText.match(/(\d[\d,]*)\s*completed/i)?.[1]||''; return { karma, tasks_completed: completed, stats, url: window.location.href }
steps.name: page_data
steps.label: Extract data
